scripts.release:check-env: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; test -n "$EXPO_TOKEN" || { echo "EXPO_TOKEN is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; test -n "$ASC_APP_ID" || { echo "ASC_APP_ID is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; test -n "$EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL" || { echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; echo "release env ok"'
scripts.eas:build:testflight: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; test -n "$EXPO_TOKEN" || { echo "EXPO_TOKEN is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; npx -y eas-cli@latest build --platform ios --profile testflight --non-interactive'
scripts.eas:submit:testflight: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; test -n "$EXPO_TOKEN" || { echo "EXPO_TOKEN is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; test -n "$ASC_APP_ID" || { echo "ASC_APP_ID is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; npx -y eas-cli@latest submit --platform ios --profile testflight --latest --asc-app-id "$ASC_APP_ID" --non-interactive'
scripts.release:testflight: bun run eas:build:testflight && bun run eas:submit:testflight
scripts.eas:build:ios: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; test -n "$EXPO_TOKEN" || { echo "EXPO_TOKEN is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; npx -y eas-cli@latest build --platform ios --profile production --non-interactive'
scripts.eas:submit:ios: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; test -n "$EXPO_TOKEN" || { echo "EXPO_TOKEN is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; test -n "$ASC_APP_ID" || { echo "ASC_APP_ID is required in native-app/.env"; exit 1; }; npx -y eas-cli@latest submit --platform ios --profile production --latest --asc-app-id "$ASC_APP_ID" --non-interactive'
scripts.release:ios: bun run eas:build:ios && bun run eas:submit:ios
